function.name: deviceState_getStatus
function.description: This function is used to retrieve the status of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to retrieve the status.

groupAction.description: The group action to retrieve the status.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to retrieve the status.
